subject: Pedals
description_text:
Hello,

Around 2 months ago, i purchased the simsonn plus x pedals from your site.
Everything went really well: delivery, installation, quality, etc.
However, now that i have used my pedals for some time, the accelerator
pedal squeaks when i press and let go of the pedal.
It is really annoying and it is distracting me from my races.
I was wondering if you have a solution for me.
Besides this problem, i am really enjoying your product!
I am looking forward for your reaction.

Sincerely,
Bram

conversations.body_text: Hi Bram van keeken,    You can try applying a small amount of lubricating oil to the key moving parts as described in the manual. If the noise persists, please remove the throttle’s one-way hydraulic damper — if the squeak disappears afterward, we can send you a new damper as a replacement.  Please note that a slight fluid sound inside the throttle is normal, as it is caused by the internal liquid movement that provides realistic damping feedback. You can also adjust the damping level and stroke range to fine-tune the pedal feel to your preference.

Hi,

I wanted to let you know that after taking some parts apart and putting
them back together, the squeaking stopped!
Thank you for your help.
Now i'm really enjoying my pedals again!

Sincerely,
Bram van Keeken
